duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as a trusted advisor and Subject Matter Expert (SME) to strategic clients in the mortgage industry.
Use deep knowledge of mortgage analytics and scores innovations to support clients' strategic objectives and provide education and training on Scores products.
Cultivate and maintain trusted advisor relationships with a variety of Mortgage client stakeholders, including Executives and heads of Capital Markets.
Lead discussions and create solutions in various settings, including client sessions, internal meetings, and industry events.
Proactively work with customer CXOs and executives to understand their most pressing business issues and successfully position FICO Scores for broad use in the industry.

Support the development, testing, and implementation of client solutions based on FICO products, and participate in the validation confirmation to ensure the resulting solution satisfies the defined requirements.
Drive marketing plan through the creation of thought leadership white papers, executive briefings, and industry symposium presentations.
Provide executive interaction support or speak at industry trade shows, conferences, and seminars.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in business, MBA or advanced degree preferred.
